avalancheActivity.highlights: Low avalanche danger will prevail. Individual avalanche prone locations are to be found in particular on extremely steep slopes above approximately 2400 m.
avalancheActivity.comment:
The mostly small wind slabs must be evaluated with care and prudence in particular on extremely steep shady slopes above approximately 2400 m. Avalanches can in isolated cases be triggered in the old snowpack.
Apart from the danger of being buried, restraint should be exercised as well in view of the danger of avalanches sweeping people along and giving rise to falls.
The numerous rocks hidden by the recent snow are the main danger. Over a wide area only a little snow is now lying. As a consequence of mild temperatures and solar radiation a crust formed on the surface during the last three days.

snowpackStructure.comment:
Towards its base, the snowpack is faceted and weak.
Above the tree line, shady slopes: Over a wide area various wind slab layers are lying on a weakly bonded old snowpack.
Over a wide area only a small amount of snow is lying for the time of year.

tendency.highlights: Until Sunday the weather will be mild. Low avalanche danger will still be encountered.
